mapper.sql: ID, TITLE, URL, SUMMARY, ARTICLE_TYPE, PUBLISHTIME, UPDATETIME, MODALITY, UID, READ_COUNT, COMMENT_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, PV,COLLECT_COUNT, STATUS

choose.when: SELECT c.*,a.NICKNAME,a.AVATAR FROM t_w_work_info c, T_A_OAUTH a WHERE a.OAUTH_TYPE='email' AND a.U_ID=c.UID AND c.`STATUS` ='30' order by c.PUBLISHTIME DESC
choose.otherwise: SELECT t1.*,t2.NICKNAME,t2.AVATAR,IFNULL(t3.STATUS,'0') likeStatus,t3.UID likeUid FROM t_w_work_info t1 INNER JOIN T_A_OAUTH t2 ON t1.UID= t2.U_ID AND t2.OAUTH_TYPE='email' and t1.`STATUS` ='30' LEFT JOIN t_w_like t3 ON t1.ID=t3.TID and t3.uid=#{vo.loginUid} order by t1.PUBLISHTIME DESC

mapper.select: SELECT t1.*,t2.NICKNAME,t2.AVATAR FROM t_w_work_info t1 INNER JOIN T_A_OAUTH t2 ON t1.UID= t2.U_ID AND t2.OAUTH_TYPE='email' and t1.STATUS='30' AND t1.ID=#{vo.id}
SELECT t1.*,t2.NICKNAME,1 mold FROM t_w_work_info t1 INNER JOIN t_a_oauth t2 on t1.UID = t2.U_ID and t2.OAUTH_TYPE='email' and (t1.TITLE like "%"#{dto.title}"%" or t1.SUMMARY LIKE "%"#{dto.title}"%")

SELECT t1.articleCount,t2.draffCount FROM( SELECT UID,STATUS,count(*) articleCount FROM t_w_work_info c GROUP BY UID,STATUS HAVING c.UID=#{vo.queryUid} and c.`STATUS`='30')t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UID,STATUS,count(*) draffCount FROM t_w_work_info c GROUP BY UID,STATUS HAVING c.UID=#{vo.queryUid} and c.`STATUS`='10') t2 ON t1.UID=t2.UID

update.foreach: update t_w_work_info set pv=IFNULL(pv,0)+#{pv} where id=#{id}

mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM t_w_info_label c,t_w_label d where c.label_id=d.ID and c.WID=#{id} order by createdate desc
SELECT c.* FROM t_w_work_column c,t_w_info_column d WHERE c.ID=d.CID AND WID=#{id} order by createdate desc

SELECT c.*,d.CID,e.NICKNAME FROM t_w_work_info c,t_w_info_column d,t_a_oauth e WHERE c.ID = d.WID and c.UID=e.U_ID and e.OAUTH_TYPE='email' and c.UID=#{vo.queryUid} and d.CID=#{vo.colId} order by c.PUBLISHTIME desc
